website_summaries.verdict: A rich self-tanning cream that offers natural color without the unpleasant scent.
pros: Rich cream that easily absorbs into skin
A little goes a long way
cons: May stain your clothes and sheets

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite self tanner ever. It's not a spray, so it doesn't get all over the place like others I've used. And it's actually very moisturizing, so your legs and body don't feel tan but flaky! It goes on evenly, and is subtle, but you can add more later if you like it a little darker. It's a very natural color, and does not smell bad, amazingly. I apply with my hands - not a mitt, so I can tell how much I'm applying. Just wash hands after & you're good to go! I love it. Buy it, so they don't stop making it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Corie R.

customer_reviews.title: First Impression was good, but then....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this product the first time I tried it. The 'tan' looked remarkably natural and I thought I'd finally found my perfect self-tanner (being a redhead, I burn easily and avoid the sun as much as possible. Consequently, I can look rather ghostly!) When I re-applied the lotion a few days later, as the original 'tan' started to fade, it still looked pretty good. However, after another week (or so) and another application, I definitely looked orange! So, in the future, I'll only use when I absolutely need to look 'freshly' tanned and NOT as a way to maintain an 'all-summer-tanned' look.
customer_reviews.author: The Lainch

customer_reviews.title: Great glow, long lasting and fades beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I have literally tried over 20 self-tanners to date and can honestly say this one is in my top 3. Not only does it look great after just one application it fades gradually too after showering etc. Like any self-tanner be sure to exfoliate and all the rest before you apply, be careful on elbows/hands/knees where it can easily cake on. One application lasts me 7-10 days before I need to touch up, I don't load a ton on I am just incredibly fair skinned and am trying my best not to look anaemic! So if you are looking for a nice light tan that gives a good glow and smells great I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Char.Con

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've tried, but still a bit of an orange fake time to it.
customer_reviews.text: I have olive skin so this doesn't darken me a ton, but it does give a golden tan look that fades naturally after about 7 days. It was not brown like I had hoped, but it wasn't too orangey either. It doesn't look like a real tan because of the orange, -ish basic overall tone of it, but it's not as orange looking as any other self tanner I've tried and it doesn't smell at all. I don't think it is possible to obtain a deep brownish tan with any self tanner like the real sun gives, but so far, this is the best one I've tried and I have tried many.
customer_reviews.author: C Alongi

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Dries quickly and evenly
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Dries quickly and evenly. I have tried every self tanner out there and this one is the best. Not too dark. Not too light. Just right. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is that I is a little on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: brenda tryon

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says “gradual”. You have to use it 3-4 times to notice some color. It’s a little orangey you can definitely tell it’s not a real tan. I just started using it as part of my morning lotion routine and forgot about the getting tan part, and after a few days I was like “oh hey I’m kinda tan.” Kind of expensive for what it is, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: L Block

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: Great self tanner!! I can't sit in the sun anymore due to a medication, this tanner has given me a beautiful tan with only a couple applications. Will definitely buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is perfect. I avoid the sun more and more as ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is perfect. I avoid the sun more and more as I get older but this gives my legs a sun kissed glow within hours of application. Smell isn’t overbearing or unpleasant. Only downside is that it takes a while to dry once applied but as long as you give a few extra minutes to compensate, it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning lotion I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: As someone with very fair skin I sometimes like to use a tanning lotion. It’s been forever since I’ve used a tan lotion because I’ve always had a poor experience (turning orange, bad smell, staining, etc). This lotion is the best I’ve used. I will say it is not completely odorless. But I usually apply it, leave it on for several hours and then rinse in the shower later to remove the smell but keep the tan. It builds really nicely and from what I’ve read the ingredients used are not as toxic as some lotions. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Bad tube of product
customer_reviews.text: I got a small tube of this in a Birch box and it was magnificent. This product was not the same thing. It streaked (I used a mitt then my hands, made no difference) the worst I’ve ever seen and the product turned green around the cap. I suspect this was an old old tube. I tried it several times, scrubbing myself with a loofah and exfoliating soap before applying, using no lotion, did everything as instructed. Won’t buy it again. Won’t ever buy self tanners from here again because they may be years old.
customer_reviews.author: Lola L. Potter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this. For me I have quite a glow the next morning. I am tired of all the self Tanner's that are messy and transfer onto everything. Most self Tanner's make me look green. Threw them out and use this. I have the self tanner in this brand and it dries in seconds. But I love this gradual tanner the best. No mess and it doesn't look fake. Plus great for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Dunkin

customer_reviews.title: Applies easily. Tans wonderfully but not really dark if that’s what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The color was great. Looked like a nice light tan. It applies very nicely. Used twice for a wedding. It did have a slight scent but not overpowering. The reviews I read said you didn’t need gloves but the tips of my fingers did stain some even though I washed right afterwards. So use gloves. It’s made with moisturizing ingredients but I honestly didn’t notice any moisturizing affects. It is my first time using a self tanner but I don’t think I will try anything else because I am very happy with how this looks on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: BSF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing natural color
customer_reviews.text: I tan easily in the summer but need some extra tan year round a d this stuff is amazing, it’s wsy more moisturizing then St Tropez abs gives you a natural bronze tan.. I used it every other day for 1 week and got so many compliments. I don’t need to self tan when using this gradual tanner it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I put it on every night before I go to sleep. Doesn't stain my sheets (although I tend to use darker sheets) or my pajamas. I have definitely got darker and people have noticed. Smell is minimal compared to others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Guaspari

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and no strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Got a sample of this a while back and finally bought the full size. Great product and leaves a subtle glow. The scent is also minimal and you don't stink of fake tan! Also didn't stain my hands.
customer_reviews.author: christie burns

customer_reviews.title: Great self-tanner at good price
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff- it has very little smell which I love because I hate very smelly tanning lotions. I put it on before bed and it doesn't stain my white sheets at all-- it also rarely streaks-- only if I put it on in a rush. No need to use gloves with this which is also a huge plus for me! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Film Lover

customer_reviews.title: So natural
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a completely natural glow. I used once, and had just the right amount of color. I will definitely apply again to maintain and be a bit more tan. I have super sensitive skin, and most spray tans/self tanners give me a rash all over. This did not do that! 😊 The product is very thick, and can look very white going on.. but just keep rubbing in and it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't wow'ed
customer_reviews.text: I have been slowly but surely switching out products for less toxic, environmentally friendly products (lotions, shampoos, makeup, etc.) And I wanted to like this tanning lotion, but I'm not that thrilled. Twice I tried it, both times I was well exfoliated, but it left me streaky. While the smell isn't horrible, it isn't pleasant. I'll probably use this once I have a good natural tan to keep up my base.
customer_reviews.author: popsmoonface

customer_reviews.title: This is my "go to" sunless tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I do not tan at all. I've tried other sunless tanners and I never thought they made my skin look tan, but this one really does!!! I received a sample in my Birchbox a couple years ago. It worked so well, I ordered a tube of it. When that one ran out, I ordered another one. It is a great product. I don't think it smells bad, but I'm not thrilled with how it smells. It does give me some color and that's why I like it. One tube usually lasts all summer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best gradual self tanner I have ever found!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best self tanners I have used. Loved that its ingredients are pure and clean. Its building tanner, so it takes about a week to start seeing a glow. It sets in quick and has a really pleasant fresh scent. Great for face too. I am a usually a fake bake user, but I'm a mom now and need something that didn't need washed off after 8 to 12 hrs. This fits my bill! Amazed! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: banjoben

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is top 5 one of the best self tanning lotions I have used. Does not make you orange at all! I do not have the hand mit to use in conjunction with this but I have never had any issues of streaking. I make sure to blend it very well and work it into my skin. Great product and will purchase again when I begin to run out!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not gradual
customer_reviews.text: Nothing "gradual" about this tanner for me. I applied it after showering around 7pm and by 10pm I was a whole different color. The 2nd application 2 days later turned orange on me. So only 1 application from now on and 2 or 3 days prior to outside event once it's had a chance to wear off a bit. I will say it did not streak which is a plus. Would probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I've used self tanners for 20 years, and this is by far the best of the best. 1 application gave me a nice healthy looking glow. I did a second the following day and it was perfect! No smell and fast drying. Put lotion on your feet first. I have a spot or two that got too dark. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperGurl

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion works wonderfully without any streaking!! Looks like a natural tan all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Gradual tan, mild scent, very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This lotion is very moisturizing unlike other self tanners I've tried. Also there is not much of a scent which is nice. Gradual tanning process which makes it less scary to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color and only have to use once a week to keep up.
customer_reviews.text: I would def buy this self tanner again. I had bought a different brand that I loved, but decided on this due to being more organic. I only have to use once a week to keep up the color. I have had several compliments . Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Apo

customer_reviews.title: Best. Tanning
customer_reviews.text: Best. Tanning. Lotion. EVER! I use this on my entire body. Doesn't cause streaking, doesn't look orange. Use daily for best results. I have super sensitive skin and am prone to breakouts and I even use this on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an auburn redhead with brown eyes and some freckles. I can tan but have to be careful, and really hate the orange look of some sunless tanners -this one looks so natural! Even though it has that familiar smell, it's really mild; I can apply right after my shower and I won't stink. Highly recommend - worth the price, and it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Deedub

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this self tanner. It did not make my ankles and knees yellow, which is wonderful! The smell was kinda strong, but that is just my preference. I would highly recommend this to anyone and do plan to buy another bottle when I finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Best sunless tanner I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this lotion from a sample subscription that I belong to. I was so pleased with the sample that I ordered the full size tube here. Lovely bronze (NOT orange) color that develops over the course of the day. Works super well with a little old-fashioned sun to make a nice deep tan. I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Worked first time
customer_reviews.text: I am part Hispanic, but ever since I moved to KY and work a full-time job in an office, I have been so white! I lived in Texas before, so I did not have this problem at all. I've never tried any tanning lotions before, but whenever I tried this, I woke up the next morning and had almost immediate results, It is more like an ointment and is very easy to put on. It is completely clear going on. (Don't let this fool you though - make sure to wash hands afterward) It is not too crazy but definitely noticeable. Just what I needed. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Aceves

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: The best. Almost zero smell, dries quickly, not orange or sticky. I'll never use a different self tanner. 100% A+
customer_reviews.author: Tldal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Daily Use. Easy application. Fast results.
customer_reviews.text: As said on the bottle results within 4-8 hours. Applied in the morning onto clean skin and exfoliated skin after a shower, took a picture and noticed a slight tan in 6 hours. The following day I had a perfect sun kissed glow that applied everyday to every other day for maintenance. I typically have very dry skin because I take very hot showers and this product is very moisturizing, can use as a daily moisturizer. The would not say the smell is bad, but not the best. I only noticed the smell on my hand after application, it does not linger on my body throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amity Retuta

customer_reviews.title: Using for years!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I’ve been using it for years. Doesn’t stain anything. Easy application, I just use my hands. It’s a gradual tan but never looks orange. I put on lotion first and then apply, that way it goes on evenly.
customer_reviews.author: America

customer_reviews.title: Subtle natural looking color
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard to find a low EWG rating tanning lotion, but this fit the bill and wasn’t overly expensive for occasional use. I thought the tan was natural looking. I am quite pale, so the hue was subtle. It as easy to apply with proper exfoliation beforehand. No bad/strong smell too, which was a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Manno3

customer_reviews.title: Best fake tanner EVER
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, doesn’t streak or stain, and gives a very natural color. I will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: Best Self-Tanner I've used
customer_reviews.text: I first got this as a Birchbox sample and then ordered from here. It looks so good compared to others--and I've tried a lot. Definitely would recommend this over others. I'm fairly light skinned w/ light eyes so that says a lot for the ability to change fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I love this tanner! Super light, forgiving, and doesn’t smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Superior tan
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me great color. I had previously purchased it through a department store and loved it so I was thrilled to find it on Amazon. I even got my sister hooked on it. One piece of advice though - invest in an application mitt as it helps spread the product on smoothly and you don’t have to worry about overly tan hands.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Gangler

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have tried many self tanning lotions and this is the best! It doesn’t smell and it dries quickly but the main reason I love it is because it doesn’t dry my skin out like the others. I was NOT compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft glow after 1 use and even better with second application (but I would stop at 2 applications). I would see myself continuing to apply this once or twice a week all summer for the healthy summer glow without the future wrinkles. Love that it is a cleaner product too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Weston

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good one
customer_reviews.text: Nice results but do your exfoliating and take the time to smooth it on evenly or it will be patchy just like any self-tanner. The usual self-tanner scent is there but doesn’t linger.
customer_reviews.author: my cat lucky

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tanning lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Gives you perfect tan color(I am extremely pale)gradually without the orange tint, lasts for 3 days and smells good. I've tried every brand and paid a lot of money and hands down, this one is the best! I received a sample of this and just had to have it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wondermom3

customer_reviews.title: Tans naturally.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t take much of this to create a nice light tan on your face quickly. Really no scent to it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: smells aweful
customer_reviews.text: this product does have a strong odor. the color is nice but can't stand the strong smell. I definitely love the brand but not this one! I use the tinted one and it has zero smell and looks so natural and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Usually 5 star product?!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product usually. I have purchased it several times here and at Nordstrom’s. I was disappointed the last bottle I received balled on application. I have never had an issue with this tanner like that. Not sure if there is an issue with quality control here?! Definitely a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pianca

customer_reviews.title: Uneven
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first two bottles I bought. This third bottle only provides an uneven tan every time I apply it. The return window was in May, so I guess that's that. I would have returned it and tried again, but now I really hesitate before buying again. This bottle has to go in the trash, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sent it right back! Not the same as full priced bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this item is authentic! I have purchased this exact item for full price in Sephora and Ulta and this item doesn’t have the same scent and is incredibly sticky it also does not give me the color payoff my regular full price purchases did.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear36

customer_reviews.title: Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best self-tanner ever!!! Doesn’t smell. Easy to apply with the mit... which please use for better application and also to protect your hands from turning orange.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Chavez

customer_reviews.text: Second time getting this product and it looks different from the first. So which one is the authentic one?
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like this tanning lotion. It's much better than store bought. No yucky smell. It's a nice choice. Leaves a little orange tint, but nothing that bothered me. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennier M T

customer_reviews.title: Gave a nice looking color after 3
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! I have fair skin and used before I went down south. Gave a nice looking color after 3 applications
customer_reviews.author: L. Youngquist

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER self tanner.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just amazing. Turns a perfect color with my skin gradually and I get ZERO orange on my hands or any joints. Best I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Waldowski

customer_reviews.title: good color
customer_reviews.text: You should definitely moisturize first if you have dry skin. otherwise, this stuff is amazing. if doesn't turn you a funny color and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Light & non-streaking
customer_reviews.text: Love this self tanner! Got it as a sample, had to order a large tube. Has great color but not too dark, buildable & never streaky. Has a light stale odor but nothing like some other tanners. This is by far my fav!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Used this product for years
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat buyer of this self tanner and is the quickest and realistic self tanner on market. And I've tried them all by now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: THE best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many self tanners and this is by far the one I consider the best. Great color, easy to apply with no mess or stained hands (or wearing gloves!). I simply apply like a regular body lotion in the morning after my shower. Lovely golden tan that lasts and does not get dry and scaly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural tan for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m very fair, but enjoy a natural tan look, especially in the warmer months and for special events. Used with the same brand glove, application was easy with a gradual tan that is easily controlled. Very natural color. Fades slowly and naturally. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: avid listener

customer_reviews.title: Unscented
customer_reviews.text: This self tanner has a light natural tan and is unscented. The lotion is moisturizing, as well. It has no color guide in it. I just apply with my hands, wash hands immediately afterwards. It does not rub off on your clothes and dries quickly. I have a fair complextion and this works great for me. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Roesch

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanning lotion. Natural glow you can control how often and dark you want it. No smell it mostureries your skin it doesnt leave streaks. By far the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Josefina

customer_reviews.title: Great non toxic tanner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff and love that it’s completely non toxic! I’m on my 4th bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey

customer_reviews.title: Worst for my skin color and so matches.
customer_reviews.text: Man.... this is not for me. I did scrub my entire body as an usual and apply it twice after once it dried . And this is the result. It paid off every single time when I washed my heads.Plus look at this ...so matches Urgh:( My sister said this products makes me looks so orange.(not in the photo cuz I rubbed it to remove.) The scent is not good neither. I think it’s not working for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this self tanning lotion, it goes on so easy and I think it looks very authentic.
customer_reviews.author: JHam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. No orange. Works great. Make sure to spread evenly. Looks natural on med skin tone. Only self tanner I use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: award04

customer_reviews.title: No streaks. No smell. Natural look.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could buy this by the gallon. This is the best sunless tanning lotion I have ever used. I have very fair skin and I never tan naturally. Sunless tanning lotion is a must for me. This is the only one I have used that doesn't generate an offensive odor. The result is a natural sun-kissed tan. The perfect accessory for shorts and skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Clark

customer_reviews.title: It’s effective and so easy to use. It’s just like using lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best self tanner I have ever used. It is gradual but effective. There is no scent at all and it does not streak. So easy to use! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: im Not happy with this! It smell awful. And it turned orange color. Definitely will not buy again . A waist of 30.00
customer_reviews.author: Tinad1112

customer_reviews.title: I'm allergic to this.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like it, allergic reaction started after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Plante

customer_reviews.title: Gradual Tanning Without Streaks or Odor
customer_reviews.text: The white lotion moisturizes, adds a light tan color without streaks or splotches. Absolutely does not rub off on clothes. It's not a DARK tan, but light golden color appropriate for fair skins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Not much different than any less expensive brand. Not strongly scented perhaps is the only difference. Compare to light spray tan, if that.
customer_reviews.author: Melclem

customer_reviews.title: Minimal results
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t noticed the kind of results I was hoping for. To get a noticeable change, you need about 3 applications. It does apply an even coat though so I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Dalla

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I like that it is also moisturizing. It creates a nice tan.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra dollars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best I have tried, and I have purchased many. it costs more than some drugstore counterparts, but delivers a natural hue and doesn't smell quite as bad as some. I mix with my regular lotion and use almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Miller

customer_reviews.title: No streaks! Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this twice (24 hours apart) and the color is a perfect bronze with no streaks and applies evenly. Love that this product is free of harsh chemicals. I will be reordering in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tanning results, very natural! Goes on just like regular body lotion, will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner!
customer_reviews.text: Very natural color, not orangey, even color, no yucky smell. Best self-tanner I have used! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: no smell!
customer_reviews.text: no smell, easy to apply and gives nice tan color. none of that orange junky color. best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy N

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Product among other things transfers color onto clothing
customer_reviews.text: Rubs off on clothing and goes on uneven and off color!
customer_reviews.author: marsha malanga

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT VITA LIBERATA Fabulous Sunless Tanning Gradual Tanning Lotion. It smells nothing like the actual product and it caused me to majorly break out. I have used the true product many times and never had any issues. Do not buy this fake product off amazon. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: Great for healthy color, I use it daily!!! Great moisturizer too!
customer_reviews.author: ChristineCCadaret

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a self tanner that looks natural and moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: The result is natural on me, not orange. And I didn't have any skin irritation like with other tanning products. Just apply, no rinsing. Results in a few hours. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: xlator1

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice but didn't really tan...
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this product but little to no tan after several uses. Disappointing as the other VL products I've tried have been very good.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it moisturizing but it gives a realistic tan and doesn't stain the sheets. It acutally is used like lotion with no staining . Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: J.Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Natural Tan for Fair Skin
customer_reviews.text: Love the gradual, natural color. Moisturizing, smooth application. Fair skin looks sun-kissed and builds a lovely bronze color. Very little streaking. Almost scent-free. My favorite self tanner!
customer_reviews.author: wearitwithjeans

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not completely in love with this product. It has a nice texture, absorbs really nicely into the skin but gives a bit orange'y color and the smell is quite potent for me.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning lotion I've ever used. Does not turn your skin weird colors. Has a nice smell. Easy to apply without getting streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Makes me stink by the end of the day, still totally pale, turned my bathrobe brown. Would never buy again. I even tried mixing this with better lotion. I've tried many gradual moisturizers and this is my last favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly U.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning agent , ever...BAR NONE. Scent is not bad at all. Tan color good, not orange-y! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It has no after smell, doesn't leave any streaks and looks very natural. I
customer_reviews.author: Sweet4everMe

customer_reviews.title: Favorite self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner I've ever owned. Love the color that I get in it even after just one application. 2 applications and I'm exactly where I want to be. Last for a good 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Smells like any tanner
customer_reviews.text: I either have a very sensitive nose or this reacts on my skin, but I 100% smell it. Smells of tanning formula. I like the consistency and ease of application. Don’t know why it’s advertised as 100% smell free because for me it is not!
customer_reviews.author: KJen

customer_reviews.title: #bronzegoddess
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanning lotion, I first tried it as a sample and now I'm hooked. The fragrance is great and the slow progression of color keeps you looking natural.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking tan!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!! Good coverage, easy to use and natural looking tan.
customer_reviews.author: seashell

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and kind of an orange hue to the tan
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Not as bad as the Coola Self Tanning spray but not much better. Will not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hanselman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tan color not orange at all!! I like that the lotion is thin and smooth not thick and gloppy. Perfect summer color for my legs!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. It doesn’t make me look orange like some of the tanners I used. No smell which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it smells not to great.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: If you out to many layers on it becomes blochy the next day. I had the vita liberate luxury tan that worked great but this organic kind isn’t the same. Great vendor
customer_reviews.author: Netta

customer_reviews.title: Year round glow
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily on my face . It lets me have a healthy skin tone year round. Doesn’t have a nasty scent and is a good moisturizer .
customer_reviews.author: Veckeo

customer_reviews.title: goes on skin smooth and great color tan
customer_reviews.text: No smell, goes on skin smooth and great color tan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VITA LIBERATA Advanced Organics Fabulous Self-Tanning Gradual Lotion With Marula Oil, 6.76 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
This ultra-hydrating gradual tan lotion gives a subtle, sunkissed glow. It's gentle enough for dry and sensitive skin types, and creates a natural-looking tan that fades after four to seven days. Certified organic botanicals and a moisture locking system nourish the skin and give 72-hour hydration while Odour Remove technology ensures no smell whatsoever.

BRAND STORY
“I am passionate about creating real alternatives to sun exposure. We use the smartest technology and the purest ingredients to deliver the most natural results. Choose with confidence.” Alyson Hogg, Vita Liberata Founder.
